product_name: Marmot West Brook Rain Jacket - Men's
long_description: Add the waterproof, breathable Marmot West Brook rain jacket to your wardrobe for commutes when you need to stay dry but want a dressier look than your trail clothes. Marmot MemBrain(R) polyester/cotton fabric with polyurethane coating is waterproof, windproof and breathable, and is highly durable. 100% seam-taped, two-layer construction. The Marmot West Brook rain jacket has a removable hood and adjustable snap cuffs. Chest pockets and hand pockets feature snap-flap closures; internal zippered media pocket; internal welt pocket.
short_description: Add the waterproof, breathable Marmot West Brook rain jacket to your wardrobe for commutes when you need to stay dry but want a dressier look than your trail clothes.
